headline: Dollar’s haven status faces a key test after Israel strikes

headline: The Best High-Yield Bank Stock to Invest $25,000 in Right Now
summary: The Canadian banking giant started a business shift in 2024.  After no dividend hike in 2024, Scotiabank is back on the dividend growth train.  Citigroup (NYSE: C) is a popular U.S. bank with an attractive 2.8% yield.
